column4: gye me fi m’atamfo nsamu: Fa me sie sor fi hɔn a wɔsoɛr tsia me no nkyɛn."

column3: Na gye me nkwa fi bɔgyapɛfo nsamu."
wɔtsɛw me kra; Akatakyi boaboa hɔn ano tsia me: Ao
column6: eso nnyɛ mo bɔn ntsi a."

column2: "Nnyɛ mo mfom ntsi na wotu mbirika siesie hɔnho: Kenyan wo ho bɔboa me

column5: Soɛr bɔtwe amanaman nyinara aso: Mma nnhu emumuyɛfo mbrato biara mbɔbɔr."

column3: wɔdze hɔn ano wor kasa; Mfona wɔ hɔn anofamfa do: Na hɔn adwen nye dɛ

column4: ebɛserew hɔn; Ɔwo ibesi amanaman nyinara atwetwe."

column3: ɔwo na mobɔhwɛ wo kwan: Na ɔwo Nyankopɔn

column2: "Me Nyankopɔn dze n’adom botwar m’ano: Nyankopɔn bɛma mehu m’apɛdze wɔ m’atsɛweefo ho."

column3: bɛyɛ na me man werɛ efir: Fa wo tum bɔ hɔn petse
Na mpaa na akɔhwisɛm a wɔka ntsi
column4: Ma wɔnkyer hɔn wɔ hɔn ntsɛn mu ara."

column5: Na ma wonhu dɛ Nyankopɔn na odzi Jakob do hen

column2: "Na emi dze mobɔtow w’ahoɔdzen ho ndwom; Nyew
column3: mobɔtow wo mbɔbɔrhu ho ehurusi ndwom anapa: Na ɔwo na ayɛ m’abantsentsen
column4: Na guandɔbew wɔ m’ahokyer da no mu."

column3: ɔwo na mobɔtow ayɛyindwom ama wo: Na Nyankopɔn nye m’abantsentsen
